code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'../estilos/Countdown.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Countdown=_ref=>{let{lang}=_ref;const calculateTimeLeft=()=>{const weddingDate=new Date('2025-09-20T18:00:00');const now=new Date();const difference=weddingDate-now;let timeLeft={};if(difference>0){timeLeft={days:Math.floor(difference/(1000*60*60*24)),hours:Math.floor(difference/(1000*60*60)%24),minutes:Math.floor(difference/1000/60%60),seconds:Math.floor(difference/1000%60)};}return timeLeft;};const[timeLeft,setTimeLeft]=useState(calculateTimeLeft());useEffect(()=>{const timer=setTimeout(()=>{setTimeLeft(calculateTimeLeft());},1000);return()=>clearTimeout(timer);});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{id:"countdown",className:"countdown",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:lang.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"timer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[timeLeft.days," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:lang.days})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[timeLeft.hours," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:lang.hours})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[timeLeft.minutes," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:lang.minutes})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[timeLeft.seconds," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:lang.seconds})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"https://calendar.google.com/calendar/u/0/r/eventedit?text=Nombre%20del%20Evento&dates=20240930T123000Z/20240930T143000Z&details=Detalles%20del%20evento",target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"calendar-btn",children:"Agendar"})})]});};export default Countdown;
